content.html:
Warm Up Activity

  1. Write some solutions to the inequality \( y ≤ 9.2 \). Be prepared to explain what makes a value a solution to this inequality.

Enter your answer here:

Compare your answer to the sample responses:

\(9.2\), \(8\), \(4.5\), \(-7\)



  1. Write one solution to the inequality \(7(3 − x) > 14\). Be prepared to explain your reasoning.

Enter your answer here:

Compare your answer to the sample responses:

\(0.5\), \(0\), \(-1\), \(-6\)
